title: The State of Museums
description: Penta senior writer Abby Schultz and Laura Lott, president and CEO of the American Association of Museums, discuss how museums across the country grappled with the pandemic, and reopening, and about how they are addressing diversity, equity, access, and inclusion.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
